#summary Tutorials: Removing a persistent object without transactions.
#labels Phase-Support

{{{
		repository.remove(persistenObjectId);

}}}

Invoke remove  while specifying an identity to delete an object from the repository. The method returns the removed object or null when the repository doesn't contain the requested identity.

Related test case: [http://code.google.com/p/gloodb/source/browse/trunk/GlooDB/GlooDBTutorial/src/test/java/gloodb/tutorials/simple/SimpleRemoveTest.java SimpleRemoveTest]
